title: ENG-295576 - User group filter on the Real time policies page is not taking into account the exclusion condition
custom_steps:
create a user group based policy with exclusions included for a user group

save and apply the policy

create a user based policy with exclusions included for some users

save and apply the policy

create a organization unit policy with exclusions included for some ou units

save and apply the policy
custom_expected:
In the policy page test with these filters.

show matched policies only for ou group
show matched policies for ou unit only
apply matched policies for user only. even though we select specific user in the filter if there is any policy with any user it get’s listed on applying filter. this is expected and as per design.
